name: Legions of Fire
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Enflamed]] locations (to a maximum of 5).
[cultist]: -3. If you fail, and it is Agenda 2, 3 or 4, your location is now [[Enflamed]].
[tablet]: -2. If you are at an [[Enflamed]] location, draw additional token and resolve both.
[elder_thing]: —X. X is half the shroud value of your location, rounded up. If you fail and your location is [[Enflamed]], take one damage.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Enflamed]] locations (to a maximum of 10).
[cultist]: -4. If you fail, and it is Agenda 2, 3 or 4, your location is now [[Enflamed]].
[tablet]: -3. If you are at an [[Enflamed]] location, draw additional token and resolve both.
[elder_thing]: —X. X is the shroud value of your location. If you fail and your location is [[Enflamed]], take one damage.

name: Assassin's Cloak
text:
Fast.
[reaction] After an enemy engages you: Exhaust Assassin's Cloak and test [agility](X), where X is that enemy's fight value. If you succeed, automatically evade that enemy and deal one damage to it.

name: Embers of Annihilation
text: [fast]: Attach Embers of Annihilation to your location. If it is already attached to your location, detach it and return it to your play area instead. Forced - At the end of the investigation phase, each investigator and non-[[Elite]] enemy at attached location takes 1 damage.

name: Embers of Annihilation
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [intellect](2). This test gets +X difficulty, where X is that enemy's fight value. If you suceed, you may choose two of the following: - Discover two clues at your current location. - Draw three cards. - Play an [[Ally]] from your hand for a -2 cost.

name: Cursed Burn Wound
text: Revelation - Put Cursed Burn Wound into your threat area. Cursed Burn Wound can be healed as if it is a single point of horror or damage on you (if it is healed, discard it) Forced - When you draw a [auto_fail] token from the chaos bag: Take one direct damage or one direct horror.
